attributes.additional_details:
I was shocked to read the article in the British Medical Journal which demonstrates how a Government, which we elect, is more influenced by alcohol companies and stakeholders than Health Professionals.
Why do we allow this?...do you know a person with an alcohol problem?... or even worse, would your child develop one?

Please see the link below:

http://www.bmj.com/content/348/bmj.f7646

extract from BMJ article

"In a BMJ investigation, Jonathan Gornall discovers that the government consultation into introducing a minimum unit price for alcohol in England and Wales was a sham and that politicians ignored the strong health evidence in favour of protecting the interests of industry"

rejection.details: You may wish to resubmit, being more specific in your description re what action you would like the government to take.
